dragAndDrop.description: This is true if it was a drag and drop event

size.description: This is the total size of the files that were uploaded

count.description: This is the number of files uploaded.

failCount.description: The number of files in this batch that failed to upload.

abortCount.description: The number of files in this batch that were cancelled before completing.

successCount.description: The number of files in this batch that successfully uploaded.

extension.description: This is the extension of the file that was uploaded if a single file was uploaded.

uploadType.description: The mechanism used to upload the files.
